nodes.beat: Jack, a poor Roman boy, trades his last cow for magic beans from a mysterious stranger.
His mother, angry, throws the beans out of the window, which grow into a giant beanstalk overnight.
Curious, Jack climbs the beanstalk and finds a castle inhabited by a giant.
Jack steals a bag of gold coins from the sleeping giant and escapes down the beanstalk.
Jack and his mother use the gold coins to buy food and clothes, living comfortably.
However, their wealth dwindles and Jack decides to climb the beanstalk again.
This time, Jack steals a golden goose that lays golden eggs and escapes the giant once more.
The wealth from the golden eggs allows Jack and his mother to live a life of luxury in Rome.
His mother, furious, discards the beans in the garden, which sprout into a mammoth beanstalk.
Jack steals a magical harp that plays itself from the giant and flees.
The music from the harp brings joy and prosperity to Jack and his mother.
This time, Jack steals a magical mirror that shows the future and narrowly escapes the giant.
The mirror's foresight allows Jack and his mother to become influential figures in Rome.
Jack, a daring Roman boy, receives magic beans from a stranger in return for his cow.
Jack steals a magical shield from the giant's treasury and escapes.
The shield protects Jack and his mother from any harm, allowing them to live peacefully.
This time, Jack steals a magical sword that can cut through anything and narrowly escapes the giant.
The sword's power allows Jack to become a celebrated gladiator in Rome.
Jack steals a magical lyre from the giant and flees.
The music from the lyre brings happiness and prosperity to Jack and his mother.
This time, Jack steals a magical crown that grants wisdom and narrowly escapes the giant.
The crown's wisdom allows Jack to become a respected senator in Rome.
Jack steals a bag of magical seeds from the sleeping giant and escapes down the beanstalk.
Jack and his mother plant the seeds, which grow into a variety of exotic plants, providing them with food and medicine.
The wealth from the golden eggs allows Jack and his mother to start a successful farm in Rome.
nodes.summary: Start successful farm with golden eggs

nodes.beat: Jack steals a magical map from the giant and flees.
The map leads Jack and his mother to hidden treasures around Rome, making them wealthy.
The mirror's foresight allows Jack and his mother to become influential figures in Rome.
Jack steals a magical chalice that never empties from the giant and escapes.
The chalice provides Jack and his mother with endless food and drink, allowing them to live comfortably.
The wealth from the golden eggs allows Jack and his mother to open a popular tavern in Rome.
nodes.summary: Open popular tavern with golden eggs

nodes.beat: Jack steals a magical scroll from the giant and flees.
The scroll teaches Jack and his mother ancient spells, providing them with magical abilities.
The mirror's foresight allows Jack and his mother to become powerful sorcerers in Rome.
